creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: abstract image; black at top; four irregular collaged rectangles--three large and one small--in a horizontal row along horizon line; irregular rounded elements with dark, dripping outlines, including one horizontal head at center, on white field at bottom; collaged elements contain abstracted faces, bones, and suggestions of other body parts, in tans, black, and white; grey strip frame
image_copyright: © Estate of Rudolf Baranik %2F Ryan Lee Gallery
inscription: Inscribed in gray and black, verso: Rudolf Baranik / \"Napalm Elegy\" (strikethrouigh of closed quotation mark) / White Night\" / 80 x 70 (strikethrough of dimensions) 70 x 80 / 1970 Oil and photo-collage / on canvas
markings: Gallery label, verso, on stretcher support bar: Ryan Lee Gallery, New York
signed: Signed in gray pigment, verso, URC: Rudolf Baranik
title: Napalm Elegy / White Night
